availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy A. Gorin. Father of William F. Gorin, Mariah B. Gorin, Sarah B. Gorin, Francis Gorin, Thompson Gorin, Samuel F. Gorin, John G. Gorin, James F. Gorin, Ellenora Gorin, Lucy Ann Gorin, George Washington Gorin, and Sallie Gorin. Miller in Hart County in 1850. Farmer in Hart County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, p. 248. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District 1, p. 59. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Election Precinct 8, p. 22.
